Text:
@ Ceteef

It is a texture pack which makes the graphics more realistic, at the expense of system performance.
so...is taht all you have to do? put that override folder into dragon age/packages/core?
cuz nothing changes when i play the game after moving the folder, "override" to where it says to in the readme

Same here - Nothing happens and I can't find any logical place to put the files either.

Any ideas?

Alright.

After scouring through a few forums I found out that the files shouln't go to the game folder but to the "My Documents" folder with the same name.

With other words, a slight misunderstanding.

Thanks for the links, however, they helped me find the solution.

:o)
